name: Hop To It
description:
Play as Frobert, a married father of two, who toils day to day in the fields to provide for his family.

Sell and buy crops to maintain your family's health bar whilst keeping an eye on the market to see what crops are selling the best!

Credits
Programming and UI: Owen Rees
Artist and Animator: Will Powell
Music and Sound Effects: Richard Stockley
Game Testing: Danica Henderson and Robert Stockley
